item.title: Running Docker in WSL v1
item.description: I have somewhat of a niche issue, where I have no network connectivity while connecting to my work VPN inside of WSL v2. I have found others complaining about this issue on Github. Though no one seems to know how to fix it and I have not had the time to properly investigate. Because of this, Iâ€™m required to continue using WSL v1. Though, with WSL v1, Docker does not work.
